recipes.title: Salmon Linguine
method: Put the linguine on to boil
Grate the courgette and finely slice the asparagus.
Put a knob of butter in a pan and fry the crushed garlic over a moderate heat.
Add the asparagus and fry for a minute or so.
Then add the courgette to the pan and fry for another few minutes.
Pour in the single cream and add the finely chopped dill.
Slice the smoked salmon into thin strips and add it to the pan.
Grate in some lemon zest and a good squueze of the juice.
Season with salt and cracked black pepper.
